article.title: Rockwell Collins to Provide MH-60 Radio Equipment
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Rockwell Collins Incorporated, Cedar Rapids, Iowa, is being awarded a $6,505,448 contract modification to exercise an option to provide AN/ARC-210(V) electronic radio and ancillary equipment for the MH-60 aircraft. The modification provides for the following quantities: 48 RT-1990(C)/ARC receiver-transmitters for MH-60R and 28 RT-1990(C)/ARC receiver-transmitters for MH-60S. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
